name: Flappy Bird Clone (Ynovation)
description:
Built a flappy bird clone as fast as I can. Spent an estimated ~24 hrs on this one spread through several days.

Played around with particles and converted my goofy head into a 2D pixel art.

For mobile players, kindly rotate your screen and use your phone's built-in browser. Screen resolution doesn't automatically adjust when played through the Facebook Browser.

Also, when I tested it on mobile it is quite laggy and still needs optimization. You might have a better experience using a desktop/laptop. 

Enjoy :D
